verses.name: Psalms 119:103
verses.text: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

verses.name: Psalms 119:104
verses.text: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.

verses.name: Psalms 119:105
verses.text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

verses.name: Psalms 119:106
verses.text: I have sworn, and I will perform it, that I will keep thy righteous judgments.

verses.name: Psalms 119:107
verses.text: I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O Lord, according unto thy word.

verses.name: Psalms 119:108
verses.text: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O Lord, and teach me thy judgments.

verses.name: Psalms 119:109
verses.text: My soul is continually in my hand: yet do I not forget thy law.
